  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205263</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Challenging Students/Changing Lives: Exploring the Oakland Military Institute</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schwierige Students/Changing Lebensdauern: 
Das Oakland Militär erforschend, leiten Sie ein</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Vies Provocantes de Students/Changing : 
En explorant les militaires d'Oakland instituez</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Vidas Challenging De Students/Changing: 
Explorando as forças armadas de Oakland institua</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Vite Challenging Di Students/Changing: 
Esplorando i militari de Oakland istituisca</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Προκλητικοί σπουδαστές/μεταβαλλόμενες ζωές: 
Εξερεύνηση του στρατιωτικού ιδρύματος του Όουκλαντ</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Vidas Desafiadoras De Students/Changing: 
Explorando a los militares de Oakland instituya</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">In this lesson, students will explore educational reform efforts in Oakland, the challenges facing Oakland Schools and the efficacy of the Oakland Military Institute.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <coverage>
            <string language="en">North America</string>
          </coverage>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">In dieser Lektion erforschen Kursteilnehmer 
Bildungsreformbemühungen in Oakland, die Herausforderungen, die 
Oakland Schulen und die Wirksamkeit des Oakland Militär-Instituts 
gegenüberstellen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dans cette leçon, les étudiants exploreront des 
efforts de réforme de l'enseignement à Oakland, les défis faisant 
face à des écoles d'Oakland et à l'efficacité de l'institut de 
militaires d'Oakland.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Nesta lição, os estudantes explorarão esforços 
em Oakland, os desafios da reforma educacional que enfrentam escolas 
de Oakland e o efficacy do instituto das forças armadas de Oakland.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In questa lezione, gli allievi esploreranno gli 
sforzi a Oakland, le sfide di riforma scolastica che affrontano le 
scuole de Oakland e l'efficacia dell'istituto dei militari de Oakland.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σε αυτό το μάθημα, οι σπουδαστές θα ερευνήσουν τις 
προσπάθειες εκπαιδευτικής μεταρρύθμισης στο Όουκλαντ, οι 
προκλήσεις που απασχολούν τα σχολεία του Όουκλαντ και την 
αποτελεσματικότητα του στρατιωτικού ιδρύματος του Όουκλαντ.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En esta lección, los estudiantes explorarán los 
esfuerzos en Oakland, los desafíos de la reforma educativa que hacen 
frente a las escuelas de Oakland y a la eficacia del instituto de los 
militares de Oakland.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

    </metadata>
  </description>
